#summary PTF Tools: SDBToken generates a token to be used with the Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors.
#sidebar PTF_Sidebar

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBTokenlogo.png

= Introduction =

The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors require an access token to be able to collect usage data from your account.

= Details =

The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors require an access token to be able to collect usage data from your account. This tool provides you with the steps to take to obtain this access token.

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBToken.png

The obtained token needs to be entered in the sensors parameter section.
For example:
{{{
-t=1g0ilwy1232dx8jlqik1123jdjzsjm
}}}

Tokens are unique for every sensor type and account that needs to be monitored.

After adding the sensor(s) and providing them with the apropiate token, the result can look like this

http://ptf-prtgaddons.googlecode.com/files/SDBSensors.png


The Skydrive, Dropbox and Google Drive sensors can be downloaded from [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Custom_Sensors_XML this] page.

The tool can be downloaded [http://code.google.com/p/prtg-addons/wiki/PTF_Tools_VersionHistory here]
